text: "Big Girls Don't Cry" is a 1962 song by The Four Seasons. It is the third single from their debut studio album Sherry & 11 Others. It went to number 1 in the United States and New Zealand and number 13 in the United Kingdom. ==References== Category:1962 songs Category:The Four Seasons (band) songs Category:Doo-wop songs
title: Big Girls Don't Cry (The Four Seasons song)
